apps.name: 5 2 Persistent Conversation Agent

apps.name: 6 1 Agent Lifecycle Callbacks
apps.description: This tutorial demonstrates how to use `before_agent_callback` and `after_agent_callback` to monitor agent execution lifecycle.

apps.name: 6 2 LLM Interaction Callbacks
apps.description: This tutorial demonstrates how to use `before_model_callback` and `after_model_callback` to monitor LLM requests and responses.

apps.name: 6 3 Tool Execution Callbacks
apps.description: - **Before Tool Callbacks**: Monitor when tools begin execution - **After Tool Callbacks**: Track tool completion and results - **Tool Context**: Understand how tool execution is monitored

apps.name: 7 Plugins
apps.description: - **Plugin Fundamentals**: Understanding what plugins are and how they work - **Global Callback Management**: Using plugins for cross-cutting concerns - **Practical Plugin Examples**: Logging, monitoring, and request modification

apps.description: - **Sequential Agent Composition**: How to orchestrate multiple specialized agents in sequence - **AgentTool Integration**: Wrapping agents as tools for enhanced capabilities - **Web Search Integration**: Real-time market intelligence through search agents - **Business Analysis Pipeline**: From m...

apps.name: 9 2 Loop Agent
apps.description: - **Loop Agent Composition**: Execute sub-agents sequentially in a loop - **Stateful Iterations**: Persist counters and flags across iterations - **Termination Conditions**: Stop by reaching a max or when a sub-agent escalates - **Streamlit Web Interface**: Interactive UI to run iterative refinem...

apps.name: 9 3 Parallel Agent
apps.description: - **Parallel Agent Composition**: How to orchestrate multiple specialized agents concurrently - **Shared State**: How parallel children write to a common `session.state` safely - **Branching Context**: Invocation branches for clean, isolated tool/memory context - **Streamlit Interface**: A simple...

apps.name: 10 Tracing Observability
apps.description: Master monitoring and debugging with built-in tracing! This tutorial teaches you how to use the OpenAI Agents SDK's comprehensive tracing system to visualize, debug, and monitor your agent workflows during development and production.

apps.name: 10 1 Default Tracing
apps.description: Demonstrates the built-in automatic tracing system that captures all agent workflow events without any setup required.

apps.name: 10 2 Custom Tracing
apps.description: Demonstrates advanced tracing patterns including custom traces, spans, and workflow organization for complex multi-agent systems.

apps.name: 11 Voice
apps.description: Master voice-enabled AI agents with the OpenAI Agents SDK! This tutorial demonstrates how to build conversational voice agents using speech-to-text, text-to-speech, and intelligent agent workflows for natural voice interactions.

apps.name: Realtime
apps.description: A basic realtime voice agent example using OpenAI's Realtime API. This demonstrates the core components for ultra-low latency voice conversations with minimal setup.

apps.name: Static
apps.description: A complete voice interaction example using the OpenAI Agents SDK with pre-recorded audio input. This demonstrates the basic voice pipeline workflow with speech-to-text, agent processing, and text-to-speech capabilities.

apps.name: Streamed
apps.description: A real-time voice interaction example using the OpenAI Agents SDK with continuous audio streaming. This demonstrates advanced voice pipeline capabilities with live speech detection, real-time processing, and turn-based conversation management.

apps.name: 1 Starter Agent
apps.description: Welcome to your first step in the OpenAI Agents SDK journey! This tutorial introduces you to the fundamental concept of creating a simple AI agent using OpenAI's Agents SDK.

apps.name: 1 Personal Assistant Agent
apps.description: A basic personal assistant agent demonstrating the fundamental concepts of agent creation with the OpenAI Agents SDK.

apps.name: 2 Structured Output Agent
apps.description: Learn how to create agents that return **type-safe, structured data** using Pydantic models. This tutorial teaches you how to ensure your agents return consistent, validated JSON responses that your applications can reliably process.

apps.name: 2 1 Support Ticket Agent
apps.description: A structured output agent demonstrating Pydantic schema-based responses for customer support ticket creation.

apps.name: 2 2 Product Review Agent
apps.description: A complex structured output agent demonstrating advanced Pydantic schemas for product review analysis.

apps.name: 3 Tool Using Agent
apps.description: Welcome to the world of tools! This tutorial teaches you how to create agents that can use **custom functions and built-in tools** to perform specific tasks. This is where your agents become truly powerful and capable of real-world actions.

apps.name: 3 1 Function Tools
apps.description: Demonstrates custom function tools creation using the `@function_tool` decorator.

apps.name: 3 2 Builtin Tools
apps.description: Demonstrates using OpenAI Agents SDK built-in tools like WebSearchTool and CodeInterpreterTool.

apps.name: 3 3 Agents As Tools
apps.description: Demonstrates advanced orchestration patterns where agents are used as tools by other agents.

apps.name: 4 Running Agents
apps.description: Master the complete OpenAI Agents SDK execution system! This tutorial covers all aspects of running agents including execution methods, streaming, the agent loop, exception handling, and advanced configuration based on the [official running agents documentation](https://openai.github.io/openai-ag...

apps.name: 4 1 Execution Methods
apps.description: Demonstrates the three execution methods available in the OpenAI Agents SDK: sync, async, and streaming.

apps.name: 4 2 Conversation Management
apps.description: Demonstrates manual conversation threading with `to_input_list()` and automatic management with Sessions.

apps.name: 5 Context Management
apps.description: Master context-aware agent development with the OpenAI Agents SDK! This tutorial teaches you how to use `RunContextWrapper` to pass custom context objects that enable agents to access user data, session information, and state throughout their execution.

apps.name: 6 Guardrails Validation
apps.description: Master AI safety and validation with the OpenAI Agents SDK! This tutorial teaches you how to implement input and output guardrails to create safe, reliable AI agents that validate requests and responses before and after agent execution.

apps.name: 7 Sessions
apps.description: Master automatic conversation memory with Sessions! This tutorial teaches you how to use the OpenAI Agents SDK's built-in session memory to maintain conversation history across multiple agent runs without manual memory management.

apps.name: 7 1 Basic Sessions
apps.description: Demonstrates fundamental session memory management with SQLiteSession for automatic conversation history.

apps.name: 7 2 Memory Operations
apps.description: Demonstrates advanced session memory operations including item manipulation, conversation corrections, and session management.

apps.name: 7 3 Multi Sessions
apps.description: Demonstrates managing multiple concurrent sessions for different users, contexts, and conversation types.

apps.name: 8 Handoffs Delegation
apps.description: Master agent-to-agent task delegation! This tutorial teaches you how to use the OpenAI Agents SDK's handoff system to create specialized agents that can intelligently delegate tasks to each other, building powerful multi-agent workflows.

apps.name: 8 1 Basic Handoffs
apps.description: Demonstrates fundamental agent-to-agent task delegation using the OpenAI Agents SDK handoff system.

apps.name: 8 2 Advanced Handoffs
apps.description: Demonstrates advanced handoff configuration including callbacks, structured inputs, and custom tool naming.

apps.name: 9 Multi Agent Orchestration
apps.description: Master complex multi-agent workflows! This tutorial teaches you how to coordinate multiple agents using parallel execution, agents-as-tools patterns, and advanced orchestration techniques for building sophisticated AI systems.

apps.name: 9 1 Parallel Execution
apps.description: Demonstrates running multiple agents simultaneously using `asyncio.gather()` for improved performance and quality through diversity.

apps.name: 9 2 Agents As Tools
apps.description: Demonstrates advanced orchestration patterns where specialized agents are used as function tools by orchestrator agents.
